mapper.insert: insert into eden_user(user_no, question_no, user_id, user_pw, user_nickname, user_gender, user_birth, user_phone, user_email, user_findAnswer) values (eden_user_seq.nextval, #{question_no}, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_gender}, #{user_birth}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email}, #{user_findAnswer} )
mapper.select: SELECT nf.question_content FROM eden_user nu, eden_find_question nf WHERE nu.question_no = nf.question_no AND nu.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update eden_user SET question_no = #{question_no}, user_nickname = #{user_nickname}, user_phone = #{user_phone}, user_email = #{user_email}, user_findAnswer = #{user_findAnswer} where user_id = #{user_id}
update eden_user set user_last_connection_date = SYSDATE where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from eden_user where user_id = #{user_id}
select count(*) from eden_user where user_id = #{user_id} and user_nickname = #{user_nickname}
select count(*) from eden_user where user_id = #{user_id} and user_email = #{user_email}
SELECT * FROM eden_user WHERE sessionkey = #{value} AND sessionlimit > sysdate
